website_summaries.verdict: Smart light strip that provides numerous options for adding beautiful lighting around your home.
pros: Smart model is compatible with Alexa and Google Assistant
Allows you to schedule on and off times and can be controlled remotely
cons: Limited function if you don't pair it with the C by GE app, which has some bugs

customer_reviews.title: App Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: Others complained about the app and I thought to myself "I can put up with a bad interface". Boy was I wrong. I enabled 2 pre-made automations - turn on at sunrise and turn off at sunset. Only one works... Additionally, it connects to the app via bluetooth. So your phone has to be close by and bluetooth has to be one. This is unlike other devices that will connect to your home wifi network and work just fine even when you aren't home or bluetooth is off.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Newton

customer_reviews.title: Buy philips products
customer_reviews.text: The adhesive is crap also the booklet saying you can bend these. Dont buy. I bought this as a combo and no I have to make the best of it since everything else is installed and I would have to remove and box everything to return. Spend the extra money of the Philips brand. Totals waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Pandapire86

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth connection only supports 1 light at a time
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because some competitor products require a hub, and this one uses Bluetooth connection, so lights can directly connect to the phone. Unfortunately, the app keeps dropping the connections and it is only able to keep a single connection at a time. The light strips are also very thick, so I do not recommend it if unless you plan to have it in a straight line.
customer_reviews.author: Justin M

customer_reviews.title: Alexa skill doesn't work and app sometimes doesn't connect
customer_reviews.text: The light works fine and the brightness is rather good. The app itself is spotty on connection and you may need to restart the app 50% of the time for it to connect. Forget about Alexa integration. The skill is crap and either crashes or never connects.
customer_reviews.author: Ordan

customer_reviews.title: love this
customer_reviews.text: my go to LED lights!! i have two of them in my room to replace my light and im obsessed!
customer_reviews.author: cassandra shores

customer_reviews.title: Have to use super glue.
customer_reviews.text: Awful. They wouldn’t stick when I tried to apply them at all. Only bend front to back and if you even tried to bend to the side in the slightest the whole thing would fall off. 1/10 would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Trevor padgett

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This products sucks. That he’s of sucks. It does not bend around corners easily. When you connected to an extension they easily disconnect and they are overpriced
customer_reviews.author: Gabe Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Seemless integration, nice colors
customer_reviews.text: Works flawlessly with my Google home mini. Paired right up and the colors are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Works intermittently at best.
customer_reviews.text: Constantly disconnects, because of it, it’s not possible for it to work with Alexa voice control. Buy Hue strip instead!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Easy to adjust, bright LED light strip with endless color choices.  Works great with Google HomE.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to adjust, bright LED light strip with endless color choices. Works great with Google Home. I use it to shine light on the wall behind my TV to give it a nice indirectly lit appearance and make the room cozy and warm feeling. Comes with adhesive strip attached but I haven’t used it.
customer_reviews.author: Common sense consumer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Ge makes fantastic lights that connect to Amazon devices without any problems. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with adhesion at all. Have spent lots of money finding other products that have heavy duty adhesion. Still trying to find one strong enough to hold lights. Also, lights require many firmware updates which is becoming annoying. I do like the variety of colors and the level of brightness.
customer_reviews.author: Jradodson

customer_reviews.title: Terrible adhesion
customer_reviews.text: Product will not adhere to any surface . 3M adhesive foam tape is garbage rendering the unit useless for most applications
customer_reviews.author: BGbraces

customer_reviews.title: These are NOT Direct-Connect, only Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth only. Otherwise exactly what I wanted. My fault, for sure, but low rating because it doesn't work with Alexa without your phone maintaining connections or a different hub.
customer_reviews.author: j.

customer_reviews.title: Adhesion sucks
customer_reviews.text: This product is crap. For 54$ I thought I’d be able to create really cool set up. The adhesive was so lousy and pathetic for the amount of weight it had to hold it literally didn’t hold up for more than 30seconds and the full strip wasn’t even put on before it fell off. Returning this because it sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Myranda R Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Good lights
customer_reviews.text: Lights work great they are bright easy to control. Adhesive is terrible but I just used my own when theirs was a failure. App works good for controlling the lights however you can buy another part that lets you connect them to Alexa which is much more recommended
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Go with another brand
customer_reviews.text: App is garbage and makes this worthless, I was surprised that GE would put such a crap product out to the market
customer_reviews.author: TWoodz

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: This light strip is impressive, bright as hell and sturdy construction. Easy to hang (adhesive on back)
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Woods

customer_reviews.title: 3M tape sucks
customer_reviews.text: The worst 3M double sided tape ever. It was no sticking to anything. I had to use my own double sided tape and just the thought of knowing I did that bothers me every time I see the lights on. “Ghetto rigged”
customer_reviews.author: KENNETH CARVER

customer_reviews.title: Quits Responding to Google Assistant
customer_reviews.text: This product is great, but lately it has become disconnected from the Google Home. The fault seems to be with Google and not C by GE. I called C by GE and they were told that Google would fix this as soon as Tuesday, 12/08/2020, or as late as Thursday, 12/10/2020. Otherwise, call C by GE for a status update.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Leimann

customer_reviews.title: Junk product
customer_reviews.text: Will not consistently connect to the C by GE or Google Home app. Go with Hue.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Ralston

customer_reviews.title: Great Lights, bad adhesive
customer_reviews.text: My honest review of this item is that the adhesive on the strip is not very good, but the converter has great adhesive. The lights are bright and it sadends me to say I could not get the lights to stick under my counter or behind my TV.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Howe

customer_reviews.title: C by GE 80-inch LED Light Strips - Full Color Changing Lights Strip
customer_reviews.text: Setup of these lights was a breeze, but they're not compatible with Google Home. I get taken to a Chinese web site to sign into my account and link it to Google, which never happens. I thought I could bypass this by adding them to Smartthings, but GE (WiFi) isn't listed in their compatible apps. I've researched the issue through multiple web sites and there doesn't appear to be a work around. I'm going to go back to a tried and true brand of LED color changing lights and may revisit these in about 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Kilpatrick

customer_reviews.title: High-quality and welcome enhancement to a room's atmosphere
customer_reviews.text: GE makes great lights. These were easy to set up—they have tape on them, which we didn’t have to unpeel because we simply set them on the floor behind the TV. The app is basic and gives the option to choose thousands of colors and set a handful of favorite colors for one-touch access. But I was hoping that a product at this price point would have additional options, such as color coordination set to music. I did a couple firmware upgrades that were recommend right out of the package, but that didn’t add any features. Still, they look very nice and enhance the atmosphere. Also expandable up to 32 ft, which would be 4 packages worth of lights.
customer_reviews.author: D. Marvin

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: I'm having some issues with the ends of the light strip fully adhering under my cabinets (this is after I cleaned the surface). I can't seem to get them to stick. The lights themselves are very bright. They can be dimmed via the phone app (C by GE) and special plug-in. Getting everything to work together took some time and wasn't always intuitive. Eventually I got the hang of how to dim the lights and change the colors. There's other programming of the lights that can be done, but honestly I'm not ready to tackle that. Would I order this again? Probably not. It's a nice idea that's not so easily realized.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Deweese

customer_reviews.title: Well made, but so expensive!
customer_reviews.text: There's a reason why the off-brand Chinese lighting strips of this size go for about $15 -- they're garbage in comparison to these. They mostly work, but they generally rely on cheap remotes that break in a couple of weeks, power supplies that fall apart or stop working, and they often have connection problems. These lights are so much better. Same basic LED's, but sealed and using much higher quality components. My only problem with them is that even with these upgrades, $80 is pretty hard to swallow. There are a lot of options out there, you might want to shop around.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: No stick adhesive
customer_reviews.text: The adhesive was well covered but still not noticeably sticky. I couldn’t feel any adhesion with my fingers, and it doesn’t stick to any surface, let alone the back of a TV or a wall. No idea what the issue is here, but if you cannot mount it, nothing else about the product matters. Unless you plan on hanging it with nails or drooping it over a railing.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Another great GE product. These were extremely easy to install. I decided to put these behind a TV. The strip comes with tape behind them, so attaching was very simple. The app is also very well designed. It give you the option to choose a bunch of colors. They look very nice and enhance the atmosphere. The instructions also mentioned that you are able to expand these if you buy more boxes. Great light. And great product! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Nicole DiGuglielmo

customer_reviews.title: Extremely customizable!
customer_reviews.text: This strip light has brought our living room out of the dark ages into the future. Instead of a dreary medieval dungeon, our room is now brightly lit and cheery. With the app you can adjust the lighting to any color on the color wheel and any brightness under the sun. It paired seamlessly with our Alexa and you can even set a timed schedule. Love this light!
customer_reviews.author: LadyDevlyn

customer_reviews.title: Great smart led strip
customer_reviews.text: The smart led strip by ge works great. As soon as i had the ge app recognise the light my echo dot sore it and told me a new device was found. Very easy to control with voice command or with the c by he app. My only gripe is the adhesive backing isnt that strong. The two stripes on the control box are stronger. The strip is very bright and the colors look great.
customer_reviews.author: dan rossi

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!  Bluetooth doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: The bluetooth connection is HORRIBLE and fails to connect 90% of the time so turning the lights on/off is impossible. The adhesive strip is very poor quality and I had to use glue to get my light to stick. After several wasted hours with tech support and no resolution I’m throwing these away and starting over. The C by GE APP and lack of Bluetooth connectivity make this led light strip USELESS.
customer_reviews.author: Nina P.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy GE Products for home automation
customer_reviews.text: You can't control this product with your voice. It says on the box "Control with your voice*" The asterisk says "To control with your voice, buy WiFi adapter sold separately" These are way too expensive for lights that you control from a crummy app that can't connect to a hub or Alexa Don't buy GE products from home animation.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua B.

customer_reviews.title: Cant be a smart light unless you can connect.
customer_reviews.text: Nice lights when working. Frustrating set-up. After setting up and connecting and working for a day I could never get them to connect again.
customer_reviews.author: Ken G.

customer_reviews.title: Unresponsive
customer_reviews.text: Google Hime won’t find them on the network, the C by GE won’t find them, I’ve tried resetting everything, and I still can’t get this pile of garbage to respond.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: C by GE 80-inch LED Light Strips - Full Color Changing Lights Strip, Party Lights, LED Lights for Bedroom, Bluetooth Enabled, Works with Alexa and Google Assistant, Power Supply Included
product_meta.description: Size:80-Inch Light Strip + Power SupplyThe C by GE Full Color smart LED light strip helps create the perfect mood or vibe in any room. Select from millions of colors, including tunable white light that's synced with your body's sleep/wake cycle. Set schedules and scenes, change color and dim from your smart phone. Pair with the C by GE smart plug, smart switch, or C-Reach smart bridge and Alexa, the Google Assistant or Apple HomeKit for out of home and voice control. Cut the light strip to size or link up to 32-feet to add an elegant glow around counters, cabinets, soffits and headboards. Includes power supply.
feature_bullets: Upgrade your home with led strip lights and alexa: LED light strips from C by GE paired with a C by GE smart plug in the C by GE iOS/Android app enable out of home control for devices. Then add Alexa control when you enable your Alexa voice assistant.

Control your smart led strip lights away from home: With C by GE RGB LED strips, never come home to a dark house. Pair these light strips with C by GE smart plugs in the C by GE iOS and Android app to control your bulbs when you're not at home.

Enable voice control for hands-free control of your strip lights: Pair these smart light strips with C by GE smart plugs in the C by GE iOS and Android app to make LED strip lights Alexa and Google Assistant compatible. (Voice assistant sold separately)

Create custom schedules: Did you forget to turn off the lights before work? No problem; The C by GE LED lights strip can be automated so you can schedule when the LED lights turn on and off, including customized schedules for different days of the week

Choose from millions of colors with C by GE Led strips: Create a scene or save your favorite colors to match your style by pairing the C by GE smart LED strip lights with the C by GE iOS and Android app.
Use C by GE smart plug to enable alexa and google home: Pair the C by GE Smart Plug with your Smart Light Strip to enable voice control with Alexa and Google Home and out of home control
For set up help and product questions, call our C by GE customer support team at 1-844-302-2943 or email: help@cbyge.com

specifications.Included Components: C by GE Full Color Smart LED Light Strip
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars80 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
